listing_by_id.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'user' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'first_name': doc.first_name, 'last_name': doc.last_name}); }

listing_by_name.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'user' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.first_name, doc.last_name],  {'id': doc._id, 'first_name': doc.first_name, 'last_name': doc.last_name}); }

group_by_username.map: function(doc) { if(doc.pvt_type != 'user' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit( doc.username, doc._id ); }
group_by_username.reduce: function(key, values, rereduce) { if (rereduce) return values; else return values[0]; }

creds_by_md5.map: function(doc) { if(doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit( doc.pvt_md5_auth, {'id': doc._id, 'account_db': doc.pvt_account_db} ); }

creds_by_sha.map: function(doc) { if(doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit( doc.pvt_sha1_auth, {'id': doc._id, 'account_db': doc.pvt_account_db} ); }
